thread.title: World Moto Begins Moto-Meter™ Shipments
thread.title_full: World Moto Begins Moto-Meter™ Shipments - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: World Moto Begins Moto-Meter™ Shipments
text:
World Moto, Inc.
Company reaches major market penetration milestone
NEW YORK , Oct. 5, World Moto, Inc. (OTC: FARE) (BERLIN: WM7) ( BERLIN : A1J8SY) ("World Moto" or the "Company"), a leader in advanced solutions for motorcycle taxis and on-demand transport, today announced that it has begun to ship and fulfill purchase orders for the Moto-Meter™. The first units are headed to Jambi, Indonesia , on the island of Sumatra . The population of Indonesia exceeds 250 million people, and the archipelago is home to more than 1.2 million motorcycle taxis.
"This inaugural shipment of Moto-Meters is a major milestone," said Paul Giles , CEO of World Moto. "As our revolutionary meters become increasingly prevalent in major cities throughout Asia , Africa and South America , we're confident they will fundamentally transform the motorcycle transport industry, bringing safety, security and efficiency to divers, passengers and fleet operators around the world."
The Moto-Meters are being shipped to customers in Asia and Africa , who will then introduce the device into countries representing a total market of more than $500 million USD . The Company estimates that after introduction to a region, demand for the Moto-Meter™ will continue to grow, taking approximately three years to reach market saturation. The life expectancy and repurchase cycle of a Moto-Meter™ is estimated at three years.
To be added to the World Moto email distribution list, please email FARE@kcsa.com with FARE in the subject line.
About World Moto
World Moto is a technology company that designs, manufactures, markets and sells Moto-Meter products, devices that provide moto-taxi fare metering and other communication capabilities. The Company's Moto-Meter patents have been granted in 4 countries, with applications pending in another 56 jurisdictions. World Moto's products and services include the Moto-Meter™, arguably the world's first motorcycle taxi meter, Wheelies™, which display static and streaming media content on the wheels of motorcycles and automobiles, and Yes™, an e-hailing and on-demand services app. For more information on World Moto, please visit World Moto's website at www.worldmoto.com .
